data.yamlPipeline:
pipeline:
  name: GCR Trigger
  identifier: GCR_Trigger
  projectIdentifier: Pankaj
  orgIdentifier: default
  tags: {}
  stages:
    - stage:
        name: S1
        identifier: S1
        description: ""
        type: Deployment
        spec:
          deploymentType: Kubernetes
          service:
            serviceRef: GCR_Trigger
          environment:
            environmentRef: Nexus2
            deployToAll: false
            infrastructureDefinitions:
              - identifier: Nexus2
          execution:
            steps:
              - step:
                  type: ShellScript
                  name: ShellScript_1
                  identifier: ShellScript_1
                  timeout: <+input>
                  spec:
                    shell: Bash
                    onDelegate: true
                    source:
                      type: Inline
                      spec:
                        script: echo "Hello World"
                    environmentVariables: []
                    outputVariables: []
            rollbackSteps: []
        tags: {}
        failureStrategies:
          - onFailure:
              errors:
                - AllErrors
              action:
                type: StageRollback
  variables:
    - name: GcrRegistryHostName
      type: String
      description: ""
      value: gcr.io
    - name: GcrImagePath
      type: String
      description: ""
      value: test-image-path
    - name: GcrTag
      type: String
      description: ""
      value: test-tag
